channel.title: Publications on Organic Chemistry and Molecular Materials Research Laboratory
channel.description: Recent content in Publications on Organic Chemistry and Molecular Materials Research Laboratory

item.title: Cover Arts
item.description: Some Works that have been selected as Cover Arts:

Representiative Work: Our way to access [9]circulene Negatively Curved Nanographenes Cheung, K. M.; Miao, Q.* submitted to Molecular Nanographenes: Synthesis, Properties and Applications Martin, N.; Nuckolls, C. (Ed.) Wiley-VCH, Germany, 2024 Synthesis, Structures and Properties of Trioxa[9]circulene and Diepoxycyclononatrinaphthalene Yang, D.; Cheung, K. M.; Gong, Q.; Zhang, L.; Qiao, L.; Chen, X.; Huang, Z. Miao, Q.* Angewandte Chemie International Edition, 2024, 63, e202402756 Back Cover of Angewandte Chemie International Edition, 2024, 63, issue 23 An Eight-Membered Ring Formed by the Scholl Reaction of o-Quateraryls

Representative Work: Heptagon-embedded Nanographene (up to 6!) via pre-macrocyclization Synthesis, Molecular Packing and Semiconductor Properties of V-Shaped N-Heteroacene Dimers Xiong, Y.#; Gong, Q.#; Miao, Q.* Chemistry – An Asian Journal, 2023, 18, e202300623 Selected as Very Important Paper An invited paper for the Joint Special Collection of Chemistry – An Asian Journal and The Chemical Record: Celebrating the 60th Anniversary of The Chinese University of Hong Kong Negatively Curved Molecular Nanocarbons Containing Multiple Heptagons Are Enabled by the Scholl Reactions of Macrocyclic Precursors

Representative Work: Summary for the Scholl Reaction in Curved Aromatics (By us or other groups) The Scholl Reaction as a Powerful Tool for Synthesis of Curved Polycyclic Aromatics Zhang, Y.; Pun, S. H.; Miao, Q.* Chemical Reviews, 2022, 122, 14554–14593 An invited review A Highly Cited Paper identified by the Essential Science Indicators (ESI) Robust Radical Cations of Hexabenzoperylene Exhibiting High Conductivity and Enabling an Organic Nonvolatile Optoelectronic Memory Wang, Y.

Representative Work: Finished the mission of conquering All Carbon Nanobelt using Scholl Reaction! Carbazole-Fused Polycyclic Aromatics Enabled by Regioselective Scholl Reactions Zhao, M.; Pun, S. H.; Gong, Q.; Miao, Q.* Angewandte Chemie International Edition, 2021, 60, 24124–24130 Design, Synthesis and Hydrogen Bonding of B3N6-[4]Triangulene Zhao, M.; Miao, Q.* Angewandte Chemie International Edition, 2021, 60, 21289-21294 Rearrangements Come to Scholl Miao, Q.* Nature Reviews Chemistry, 2021, 5, 602–603 An invited article of News & Views towards:

Representative Works: Our first Attempts on Zig-Zag Carbon Nanobelt. Recent Advances and Attempts in Synthesis of Conjugated Nanobelts Chen, H.; Miao, Q.* Journal of Physical Organic Chemistry, 2020, e4145 An invited review Cover of Journal of Physical Organic Chemistry, Volume 33, Issue 12 From Polycyclic Arenes Containing Eight-Membered Rings to Negatively Curved Nanocarbons: Progress and Outlook 从含有八元环的稠环芳烃到具有负曲率的碳纳米结构：进展与展望 Miao, Q.*; Yang, D. 缪谦*、杨代月 Progress in Chemistry, 2020, 32, 1835–1845 化学进展，2020, 32, 1835–1845 An invited paper for the Special Issue to celebrate Professor Henry N.

Representative Work: First Chiral Carbon Nanobelt !, as well as a new Armchair Carbon Nanobelt, all done by Scholl Reaction. A Tetraazapentacene-Pyrene Belt: Toward Synthesis of N-Doped Zigzag Carbon Nanobelts Wang, J.; Miao, Q.* Organic Letters, 2019, 21, 10120−10124 Highlighted by Synfacts, 2020, 16, 279 Synthesis, Structures and Properties of Heptabenzo[7]circulene and Octabenzo[8]circulene Pun, S. H.; Wang, Y.; Chu, M.; Chan, C. K.; Li, Y.; Liu, Z.; Miao, Q.* Journal of the American Chemical Society, 2019, 141, 9680–9686 A Ketone-Functionalized Aromatic Saddle as a Potential Building Block for Negatively Curved Carbon Nanobelts

Representative Work: Highest mobility achieved n-type Organic Semiconductor. Stable and Efficient 3D-2D Perovskite-Perovskite Planar Heterojunction Solar Cell without Organic Hole Transport Layer Zhang, T.; Long, M.; Qin, M.; Lu, X.; Chen, S.; Xie, F.; Gong, L.; Chen, J.; Chu, M.; Miao, Q.; Chen, Z.; Xu, W.; Liu, P.; Xie, W.*; Xu, J.* Joule, 2018, 2, 2706–2721 (Collaboration with Prof. Jianbin Xu’s Group) A Trefoil Macrocycle Synthesized by 3-Fold Benzannulation Yang, X.

Representative Work: First eight-membered ring embedded nanographene by our group! A Twisted Nanographene Consisting of 96 Carbon Atoms Cheung, K. Y.; Chan, C. K.; Liu, Z.; Miao, Q.* Angewandte Chemie International Edition, 2017, 56, 9003–9007 Selected as a Hot Paper Front cover of Angewandte Chemie International Edition 2017, volume 56, issue 31 N-Phenylated N-Heteroacenes: Synthesis, Structures and Properties Gu, X.; Shan, B.; He, Z.; Miao, Q.* ChemPlusChem, 2017, 82, 1034–1038 An invited paper for the Special Issue: Novel Aromatics: From Synthesis to Applications Synthesis, Structure and Properties of Tetrabenzo[7]circulene

Representative Work: Pushing the limit of n-type organic semiconductor, observing band-like charge transport. Polycyclic Arenes and Heteroarenes: Synthesis, Properties, and Applications Miao, Q. (Ed.) Wiley-VCH, Weinheim, Germany, 2016. Chapter 4: Polycyclic Arenes Containing Seven-Membered Carbocycles Cheung, K. Y.; Miao, Q.* Twisted Polycyclic Arenes from Diphenyltetranaphthylbenzenes by Controlling the Scholl Reaction with Substituents Yang, Y.; Yuan, L.; Shan, B.; Liu, Z.; Miao, Q.* Chemistry – A European Journal, 2016, 22, 18620–18627 Benzo[4,5]cyclohepta[1,2-b]fluorene: an Isomeric Motif for Pentacene Containing Linearly Fused Five-, Six- and Seven-membered Rings

Representative Work: 2 heptagons in 1 nanographene, we can finally see how more heptagons shape the structure of nanographene. Synthesis, Molecular Packing and Thin Film Transistors of Dibenzo[a,m]rubicenes Gu, X.; Xu, X.; Li, H.; Liu, Z.; Miao, Q.* Journal of the American Chemical Society, 2015, 137, 16203–16208 Highlighted by Synfacts, 2016, 12, 258 Solution-Processed Ambipolar Organic Thin Film Transistors by Blending p- and n-Type Semiconductors: Solid Solution versus Microphase Separation

Representative Work: A pentacene analogue with 2 heptagons, Also a great p-type semiconductor. Self-Assembled Monolayers of Cyclohexyl-Terminated Phosphonic Acids as a General Dielectric Surface for High-Performance Organic Thin-Film Transistors Liu, D.; He, Z.; Su, Y.; Diao, Y.; Mannsfeld, S. C. B.; Bao, Z.; Xu, J. Miao, Q.* Advanced Materials, 2014, 26, 7190–7196 Restriction of Intramolecular Motions: the General Mechanism behind Aggregation-Induced Emission Leung, N. L. C.; Xie, N.; Yuan, W.; Liu, Y.

Representative Work: An important progress of our group’s results on SAM layers for improved semiconductor performance. Conjugated Macrocycles of Phenanthrene: a New Segment of [6,6]-Carbon Nanotube and Solution-Processed Organic Semiconductors He, Z.; Xu, X.; Zheng, X.; Ming, T.; Miao, Q.* Chemical Science, 2013, 4, 4525-4531 Revisiting Zethrene: Synthesis, Reactivity and Semiconductor Property Shan, L.; Liang, Z.; Xu, X.; Tang, Q.; Miao, Q.* Chemical Science, 2013, 4, 3294-3297 Highlighted by Synfacts, 2013, 9, 0953 Self-Assembled Monolayers of Phosphonic Acids with Enhanced Surface Energy for High-Performance Solution-Processed N-Channel Organic Thin Film Transistors

Representative Work: Starting the journey of negatively curved nanographene and Hexabenzoperylene (HBP), which are pivotal for our group’s research. High-Quality Large-Area Graphene from Dehydrogenated Polycyclic Aromatic Hydrocarbons Wan, X.; Chen, K.; Liu, D.; Chen, J.; Miao, Q.; Xu, J.* Chemistry of Materials, 2012, 24, 3906-3915. (Collaboration with Prof. Jianbin Xu’s Group) Curved Polycyclic Aromatic Molecules that Are π-Isoelectronic to Hexabenzocoronene Luo, J.; Xu, X.; Mao, R. Miao, Q.* Journal of the American Chemical Society, 2012, 134, 13796-13803 Highly Electron-Deficient Hexaazapentacenes and Their Dihydro Precursors

Representative Work: Starting the journey of Tetraazapentacene(TAP), our star OFET molecule. The Position of Nitrogen in N-Heteropentacenes Matters Liang, Z.; Tang, Q.; Mao, R.; Liu D.; Xu, J.; Miao, Q.* Advanced Materials, 2011, 23, 5514-5518 Vapochromic and Semiconducting Solids of a Bifunctional Hydrocarbon Xia, H.; Liu, D.; Song, K.; Miao, Q.* Chemical Science, 2011, 2, 2402-2406 Switching of Non-Helical Overcrowded Tetrabenzoheptafulvalene Derivatives Luo, J.; Song, K.; Gu, F.; Miao, Q.*

Representative Work: Our group’s solution to the long-lasting questions of growing crystalline rubrene thin film. N-Type Organic Semiconductors Based on π-Deficient Pentacenequinones: Synthesis, Electronic Structures, Molecular Packing and Thin Film Transistors Liang, Z.; Tang, Q.; Liu, J.; Li, J.; Yan, F.; Miao, Q.* Chemistry of Materials, 2010, 22, 6438-6443 N-Heteroquinones: Quadruple Weak Hydrogen Bonds and N-Channel Transistors Tang, Q.; Liang, Z.; Liu, J.; Xu, J.; Miao, Q.* Chemical Communications, 2010, 46, 2977-2979 Induced Crystallization of Rubrene in Thin Film Transistors

item.title: Before CUHK
item.description: Hexathiapentacene: Structure, Molecular Packing and Thin-Film Transistors Briseno, A.L.; Miao, Q.; Ling, M.-M.; Reese, C.; Meng, H.*; Bao, Z.*; Wudl, F.* Journal of the American Chemical Society, 2006, 128, 15576-15577 Chemical Complementarity in the Contacts for Nanoscale Organic Field-Effect Transistors Tulevski, G.S.; Miao, Q.; Afzali, A.; Graham, T.; Kagan C.*; Nuckolls, C.* Journal of the American Chemical Society, 2006, 128, 1788-1789 Organization of Acenes with a Cruciform Assembly Motif
